name: Anonymous Music
description: A Music Bot written in Python using Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls for playing audios & videos in Telegram Video Chat

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from @BotFather on Telegram

SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session of dummy account (get it from @AnonymousStringBot on Telegram)

SUDOERS.description: User IDs of the users who will counted as owner of the bot

PREFIX.description: Command prefix for the player (Leave it as it is)

LANGUAGE.description: Available language code (check README.md for knowing about available languages)

QUALITY.description: An available stream quality (Available qualities - Low, Medium & High)

STREAM_MODE.description: An stream mode for the bot like audio or video

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'True' if you want /play commands only for admins
